channel.title: SysCape Version 3.0
channel.description:
Credits to xsystex used this source and LOVE IT! Thought id share it.
SysCape Version 3.0
What's this server offer:
-Dupes fixed -Auto banning ips system -Server files on a separated folder, for any mistakes (bin) -Dragon full helm, almost all PVP armour and weapons. -Edgeville doungeon with NPC (slayer master) -Island with mosses and worrior elfs -Full canifis. -Full Taverly doungeon with npcs. -Working Anti-fireshield on NPC and Players, also dragon visage droped by dragons used on fire shield with 85 smith makes it! -14 custom quest(you can do ::quests if you want to get em all done) -No antilech 100% editable client/server. -Donator zone -Disabled multi-logging in -Multi-attacking barrage/burst with correct freezing -Perfected Ancient magics -Timers on starters no trade/drop/death for 30 minutes -Only normal commands giveadmin/mod/donator - jail - ban- mute etc. -Perfect slayer tower/tasks with working gem -The best jail system out, it teles you back once you walk a square out of the house. -Godsword specials, walking, stances, running. -King Black Dragon in the correct spot -Barrow effects -Barrows minigame with working spade -All dragon weapons special -Perfected Range + Mage -Almost perfect combat, needs some changes. -Slayer tower full -All 317 skills working -Skill zone just like OBPK (great spot) -Anti-null -Full abbyss runecrafting 100% working -BigBoss custom minigame, drops rarest armour and weapons -All dragon weapon special attacks -Only the real rs customs, no stupid useless customs -Kalphite queen (cave at alkhadi) -Perfected PvP and PvN -Shops at the principal cities (varrock, falador, edge) -Teleports to every single places on the map -Client with many options, hp bars, color text and much more! -JAD with 63 waves -Assault with 5% drop rates (no boring shop) -Fight pits and pest control 100% working with timers and shop -King dagganoths with real way to get to em, agresive monsters, and real drops! -Logs of every single command staff do. -Full NPC drops with drops just like real rs. -Green, Red, Blue and black dragons full working with drops. -Lunar magic 100% -Vengance and vengance on others 100% with GFXs -Custom crown for owner. -All prayer working
And much more!
Main pictures link: http://s759.photobucket.com/albums/xx236/xsystex/ Some pictures: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/a4y0qb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2czeey8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/jzhfno.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2nopx2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/jkxbf8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vnm7m1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/aagl54.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2iqnz28.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/atodvq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2z9m8go.jpg[/img]
ALMOST FORGOT THIS, ABOUT THE "FREEZING BUG" AT THE MAKEOVER GUY, ITS ALREADY FIXED ITS JUST I FORGOT TO EDIT THE WELCOME SCREEN SORRY! LOL
And finally here is the download link:
Pack (client+server) uppit: http://uppit.com/qie67mt9a9xq/SysCape_V.3_pack.rar
Note: To change ip just go on GUI.java and search for "127.0.0.1" and change it for yours.
Hope you all enjoy it!

item.title: SysCape Version 3.0
item.dc:creator: @Fadeoutt Fadeoutt
item.description:
@Fadeoutt wrote:

Credits to xsystex used this source and LOVE IT! Thought id share it.

SysCape Version 3.0

What’s this server offer:

-Dupes fixed
-Auto banning ips system
-Server files on a separated folder, for any mistakes (bin)
-Dragon full helm, almost all PVP armour and weapons.
-Edgeville doungeon with NPC (slayer master)
-Island with mosses and worrior elfs
-Full canifis.
-Full Taverly doungeon with npcs.
-Working Anti-fireshield on NPC and Players, also dragon visage droped by dragons used on fire shield with 85 smith makes it!
-14 custom quest(you can do ::quests if you want to get em all done)
-No antilech 100% editable client/server.
-Donator zone
-Disabled multi-logging in
-Multi-attacking barrage/burst with correct freezing
-Perfected Ancient magics
-Timers on starters no trade/drop/death for 30 minutes
-Only normal commands giveadmin/mod/donator - jail - ban- mute etc.
-Perfect slayer tower/tasks with working gem
-The best jail system out, it teles you back once you walk a square out of the house.
-Godsword specials, walking, stances, running.
-King Black Dragon in the correct spot
-Barrow effects
-Barrows minigame with working spade
-All dragon weapons special
-Perfected Range + Mage
-Almost perfect combat, needs some changes.
-Slayer tower full
-All 317 skills working
-Skill zone just like OBPK (great spot)
-Anti-null
-Full abbyss runecrafting 100% working
-BigBoss custom minigame, drops rarest armour and weapons
-All dragon weapon special attacks
-Only the real rs customs, no stupid useless customs
-Kalphite queen (cave at alkhadi)
-Perfected PvP and PvN
-Shops at the principal cities (varrock, falador, edge)
-Teleports to every single places on the map
-Client with many options, hp bars, color text and much more!
-JAD with 63 waves
-Assault with 5% drop rates (no boring shop)
-Fight pits and pest control 100% working with timers and shop
-King dagganoths with real way to get to em, agresive monsters, and real drops!
-Logs of every single command staff do.
-Full NPC drops with drops just like real rs.
-Green, Red, Blue and black dragons full working with drops.
-Lunar magic 100%
-Vengance and vengance on others 100% with GFXs
-Custom crown for owner.
-All prayer working

And much more!

Main pictures link: http://s759.photobucket.com/albums/xx236/xsystex/

And finally here is the download link:

Note: To change ip just go on GUI.java and search for “127.0.0.1” and change it for yours.

Hope you all enjoy it!
